Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394287) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394287)
